title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.44 - Main landing wheels to be chocked and brakes locked prior to starting engine
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.44 - Main landing wheels to be chocked and brakes locked prior to starting engine

State Regulations

No aircraft engine shall be started unless the main
landing wheels are chocked and the brakes of the aircraft fixed and locked, unless in the opinion of the manager, proven procedures such as those followed
by the scheduled airlines, are equally safe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
